issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
LiveView is not working with Genymotion or on device. With LiveView disabled everything works fine.

Interesting: If I create a completely new Alloy Project, LiveView works fine aswell. So something during the development process gets LiveView to crash.
fields.summary: Error: [LiveView] File Server unavailable. Host Unreachable @ 192.168.1.100:8324
fields.environment:
Windows 10 64bit
Appcelerator Studio build: 4.6.0.201605201934
Titanium SDK 5.2.0.GA
Genymotion Version 2.7.2 Revision 20160613-d7856fb
(Genymotion Emulator Android 5.1.0 API 22)
Oracle VirtualBox Version 5.0.20 r106931
Node v0.12.7

comments.body:
Hello, Do a clean on the project and try to rebuild again. If the error persists, please attach the log in this ticket. 

Regards,
Sharif.
